divs: sighting detailsi was on my balcony last evening, at 9pm, looking up in the sky to the west and i thought i saw a falling star. i was speaking with my daughter who is vacationing in n.c. and told her of my observation. all of a sudden the falling star began to move upward, then to the right\left\zig zap\circular. she asked if i was on drugs... ha ha. my parents were sitting in my living room so i called them out on to the balcony to make sure i was seeing what i was seeing. we continued to watch and observed for a good hour, unsure what it was i was seeing but knew it was not something normal to the sky. i went inside and called it... an experience of some sort. i woke again at 4a.m. i looked to the sky but no longer saw the light straight ahead. i happened to look toward the south-west and saw what i thought could have been venus, a brighter, much larger light in the sky. dawn was approaching. there it was. the image, moving around this now brighter light in a similar motion i initially observed but was now to the south-west. i stood on the balcony a good hour, again, but now thought i saw a darkened image above the light. the form looked cylinder or cone shaped. it was still far away but i definitely saw an image about the light. the image was moving east which meant closer to me. omgness. did it know i was watching? out of nervousness... i went inside and drew the curtains. i was speaking of my observation to my son, michael, who works in friendly's at commack, new york. he was amazed telling me that two gentlemen walked into his store last evening between 6-7pm giving out business cards with "mufon" on it. he did not put one in his wallet but shared the fact that they were there and asked anyone in the store to call should they see anything unusual. so... here i am! he is returning to work tonite and will try to locate their business card. should he have it, i will give the gentlemen a call.
Summary: Star like light moving in motion not consistent with that of an airplane or star
